title: Product Catalog for AI Analysis
description: A structured definition of a company's product line, designed to be used as context for content and marketing analysis AI agents.

productName.description: The official, customer-facing name of the product.

productSKU.description: A unique internal identifier for the product.

primaryHealthGoal.description: The single most important outcome or health category this product addresses (e.g., 'Cognitive Enhancement', 'Stress & Anxiety Relief', 'Metabolic Health', 'Sleep Quality').

keyIngredients.description: The active ingredients that deliver the primary benefit.

function.description: The specific role this ingredient plays (e.g., 'Adaptogen for stress response', 'Precursor to neurotransmitter production').

targetCustomerArchetype.description: The primary customer archetype this product is designed for (e.g., 'The Optimizer', 'The Control Seeker', 'The Lifestyle Seeker', 'The Symptom Solver').

coreNarrativeHook.description: The one-sentence story or core promise used to sell this product (e.g., 'Reclaim your focus during high-stress days.', 'The natural way to unwind your mind before sleep.').
